page.title: 05Industry
page.content: The Brickworks have always been a very important part of {Yaxley}and their chimneys dominate the skyline for miles around.There are three Brickworks in the village area.The Orton,Beeby's and Norman Cross Brickworks.Orton Brickworks are west from the school, Beeby's Brickworks are north from the school and Norman Cross Brickworks are south-east from the school. As the bricks are made from clay being dug from a pit there are huge areas which are either waste ground or very deep water.Some of these areas are now being filled in with fly ash and will be returned to agriculture. One such area has been turned over to a nature reserve,and is already a haven for wildlife.
